Database Admin Job at Mecer Consulting Limited




        
    

        
        Mecer Consulting Limited is a world class Human Capital Development and Business Growth Re-engineering firm. Our services include, but not limited to: Workforce Development - ISO (QMS, EMS, FSMS, ITMS, MDQMS and all other quality certification) Implementation and Audit.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Database Admin

Job Location: Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time

Requirements
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
	Proven experience as a Database Administrator, preferably within the banking sector.
	Strong proficiency in Oracle Database and Microsoft SQL Server administration.
	Experience with backup/recovery tools, replication, and database tuning.
	Excellent analytical, communication, and problem-solving skills.
	High level of integrity, attention to detail, and commitment to data security.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send a copy of their CV to: hr@mecer.consulting using "Data Admin" as the subject of the email.
